医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
干细胞治疗进展：间充质干细胞在治疗 COVID-19 和流感感染方面显示出潜力宣布在《BIO Integration》杂志上发表一篇新文章。包括病毒性人畜共患病在内的传染病的出现使得人们能够对新的治疗方法进行深入研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Stem-cell-therapy-advances-MSCs-show-potential-in-managing-COVID-19-and-influenza-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Stem-cell-therapy-advances-MSCs-show-potial-in-managing-COVID-19-and-influenza-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a582a8e-eb4b-416e-a7ea-12bae9321ea3 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 08:26:14 -0400 Stem cell therapy advances: MSCs show potential in managing COVID-19 and influenza infections
研究发现接种 COVID-19 疫苗后心脏病和中风的风险较低一项涉及几乎整个英格兰成年人口的新研究显示，接种 COVID-19 疫苗后，心脏病和中风的发病率比接种疫苗前或未接种疫苗时要低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Study-finds-lower-risk-of-heart-attacks-and-中风-after-COVID-19-vaccination.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Study-finds-lower-risk-of-heart-attacks-and-中风-after-COVID-19-vaccination.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87558077-7ae6-45c5-9fd3-c21578efce00 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 08:18:33 -0400 Study finds lower risk of heart attacks and strokes after COVID-19 vaccination
世卫组织协调从加沙到阿联酋的大规模医疗后送今天，85 名加沙病人和重伤患者被疏散到阿拉伯联合酋长国 (UAE) 阿布扎比接受专门护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/WHO-coordinates-large-scale-medical-evacuation-from-Gaza-to-UAE.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/WHO-coordinates-large-scale-medical-evacuation-from-Gaza-to-UAE.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9bdca2a4-cfb3-4fb9-9307-a6d85f7c1655 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 08:08:38 -0400 WHO coordinates large-scale medical evacuation from Gaza to UAE
Spear Bio 获得 4500 万美元超额认购 A 轮融资，以加速蛋白质研究和疾病诊断产品的推出马萨诸塞州沃本 – (美国商业资讯) – Spear Bio Inc. 是一家生物技术公司，能够利用无处不在的 qPCR 设备测量低至数十个拷贝的蛋白质分子，宣布成功完成 4500 万美元的 A 轮融资。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Spear-Bio-secures-2445-million-in-oversubscribed-Series-A-financing-to-accelerate-product-launch-for- Protein-research-和-疾病-诊断.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Spear-Bio-secures-2445-million-in-oversubscribed-Series-A-financing-to-accelerate-product-launch-for- Protein-research-和-疾病-diagnostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=780f35e6-1eeb-4a69-bd9f-2b45e36cbfae Wed, 31 Jul 2024 07:53:00 -0400 Spear Bio secures $45 million in oversubscribed Series A financing to accelerate product launch for protein research and disease diagnostics
Asimov 推出人工智能驱动的第四代 CHO Edge 系统，提高滴度保证Asimov 是一家推进治疗药物设计和制造的合成生物学公司，今天宣布推出第四代 CHO Edge 系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Asimov-introduces-its-AI-driven-4th- Generation-CHO-Edge-System-with-increased-titer-guarantee.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Asimov-introduces-its-AI-driven-4th- Generation-CHO-Edge-System-with-increased-titer-guarantee.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5fb127d-933e-463e-8140-24cdc40e53fd Wed, 31 Jul 2024 07:50:00 -0400 Asimov introduces its AI-driven 4th generation CHO Edge System with increased titer guarantee
Sapio Sciences 与 Zifo 宣布战略合作伙伴关系Science-aware™ 实验室信息学平台 Sapio Sciences 和领先的科学信息学服务公司 Zifo 今天宣布建立战略合作伙伴关系，为生物技术、临床诊断和制药行业的客户带来一流的实验室信息管理解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Sapio-Sciences-and-Zifo-announce-strategic-partnership.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Sapio-Sciences-and-Zifo-announce-strategic-partnership.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25212222-95b0-42ad-8ad1-c87e80431f14 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 07:47:00 -0400 Sapio Sciences and Zifo announce strategic partnership
与肥胖等级较低的女性相比，体重指数较高的女性纯母乳喂养时间较短研究人员检查了不同种族肥胖母亲出生后六个月的护理行为及其与母亲人体测量因素和血清学代谢组的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Shorter-exclusive-breastfeeding-periods-for-women-with-a-higher-BMI-compared-to-those-with-lower-obesity-classifications。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Shorter-exclusive-breastfeeding-periods-for-women-with-a-higher-BMI-compared-to-those-with-lower-obesity-classifications。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5e7a961-7850-4fdf-967d-28e6d8a05c15 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 07:06:00 -0400 Shorter exclusive breastfeeding periods for women with a higher BMI compared to those with lower obesity classifications
益生菌 LGG 降低早产儿坏死性小肠结肠炎风险通过对随机对照试验 (RCT) 和非 RCT 的系统评价和荟萃分析，研究鼠李糖乳杆菌 GG (LGG) 对早产儿的菌株特异性影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Probiotic-LGG-reduces-necrotizing-enterocolitis-risk-in-preterm-infants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Probiotic-LGG-reduces-necrotizing-enterocolitis-risk-in-preterm-infants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b9cdb99-547b-45c4-9872-e0c6bda3783b Wed, 31 Jul 2024 05:12:00 -0400 Probiotic LGG reduces necrotizing enterocolitis risk in preterm infants

适用于透射成像应用的新型 smartStage™ 开放式框架定位平台隆重推出 SmartStage™ 开放式框架定位平台，这是 Dover Motion 利用 60 多年无与伦比的精密运动设计和制造专业知识的突破性创新。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/New-smartStagee284a2-open-frame-positioning-stage-for-transmissive-imaging-applications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/New-smartStagee284a2-open-frame-positioning-stage-for-transmissive-imaging-applications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=534a09ae-4447-4aa8-b127-11959c3e172f Wed, 31 Jul 2024 03:40:00 -0400 New smartStage™ open frame positioning stage for transmissive imaging applications
